title: Rally like Barelli with his first Guerilla Gravity Gnarvana Signature build
content:
Ready to Rally like Barelli? Unless you already possess the skills, new equipment won’t have you instantly shredding at the same level, but one can dream, right? In the meantime, you can upgrade your ride and do it in Barelli style, with his first Signature model from Guerilla Gravity. Built with an eye to his […]

The post Rally like Barelli with his first Guerilla Gravity Gnarvana Signature build appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
